  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/users/out-of-office/update-all"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Triggers a global maintenance task to synchronize user out-of-office statuses with calendar events and existing OOO records. Restricted to Global Administrators.

**Workflow Example**
1. Call [GET /api/v1.0/users/out-of-office/update-all](/docs/api/users/update-all-users-out-of-office-status) during scheduled maintenance.
2. Review the response `UserActions` list to see who was set in or out of office.
3. Use results for audit or to validate calendar integration.

**Minimal Required Fields**: None.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
